channel.title: Comments on: Spiral
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Susan
item.dc:creator: Susan
item.description: Also, your friends totally wreck the mood by poking fun at everything. But, hey, it's fun in its own way. I would like to see what you saw the first time someday.
item.content:encoded: Also, your friends totally wreck the mood by poking fun at everything. But, hey, it’s fun in its own way. I would like to see what you saw the first time someday.
